name: 0-1685 holiday glow coaster
notes:
**crocheted star-shaped coasters in drops bomull-lin. theme: christmas and new year.**
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

#holidayglowcoaster
drops design: pattern l-187
yarn group c or a + a

-------------------------------------------------------


**size**:
approx. 10 cm in diameter.

**yarn**:
drops bomull-lin from garnstudio (belongs to yarn group c)
50 g colour 03, sand

1 coaster weighs approx. 9 g.

**crochet hook**:
drops crochet hook size 4 mm.

**crochet tension**:
17 treble crochets in width and 10 rows in height with hook size 4 mm = 10 x 10 cm.
17 double crochets in width and 20 rows in height with hook size 4 mm = 10 x 10 cm.
hook size is only a guide. if you get too many stitches within 10 cm, change to a larger hook size. if you get too few stitches within 10 cm, change to a smaller hook size.
